content: this is a summary of a legal case regarding costs but the parties involved are not mentioned the case reached the higher court in ljubljana slovenia and a decision was made on february 16 2023 the appellant filed an appeal challenging a decision made by a lower court regarding data the lower court had ruled in favor of the respondent the appellant argued that the lower court made errors and requested the higher court to review the case after reviewing the arguments and evidence the higher court made a decision on the appeal the court either upheld the decision of the lower court or overturned it the courts decision on the appeal is final and cannot be further challenged the case involves a property acquired through a contract and the court needs to determine if it is part of the joint property the court found that the lower court did not establish the shares of the coowned property and remitted the case back for a new trial the decision on the costs of the appeal proceedings is still pending

metadata.CASE_ID: Sodba in sklep Višjega sodišča v Ljubljani I Cp 246/2022. 16. 2. 2023
